# panel a already generated by scripts/fconnectivity/figures/compare_connectomes/wt_unc31_differences.py for figure 5

python scripts/heat_raster_plot.py --inclall-occ --sort-avg --relative --vmax:1.2 --headless --nomerge --paired --req_auto_response --matchless-nan-th:0.5 --matchless-nan-th-added-only --dst:<destination folder> -j:AVJL -i:RIVR
